name: ConvertKit
natural_language_description: 这是 ConvertKit 节点。主要用于: Consume ConvertKit API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: form

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Add (值: add) - Add a tag to a subscriber
Get Many (值: getAll) - List subscriptions to a tag including subscriber data
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a tag from a subscriber

id.name: id
id.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sequence Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

label.name: label
label.description: The label of the custom field
label.natural_language_description: 参数名: Label | 作用: The label of the custom field | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

email.name: email
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: Subscriber email address | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.description: Receive only active subscribers or cancelled subscribers
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 作用: Receive only active subscribers or cancelled subscribers | 默认值: {}

name.name: name
name.description: Tag name, multiple can be added separated by comma
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Tag name, multiple can be added separated by comma | (必填项)

tagId.name: tagId
tagId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
tagId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tag Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)
